1.content: Choose one of the following heroes to begin your epic "Guitar Hero" Adventure.
1.title: Choose Your Hero.

11.content:
Axel Steel was sitting at home when he heard the sound of a guitar in his front yard
"Ahh another challenger!" He opened the door and ran straight into a red head "Name's Axel. watch out for a kid named Sora...tell him I said hi"
"Wait, was that you playing that guitar?" Steel said.
Axel turned and said.............
11.title: Axel Steel

choices: Izzy Messes Up The Whole Thing.
Izzy Gains The Crowd And Lands It.
13.content:
Izzy Sparks stood on the stage, he stared into the deep waves of the crowd.

Today was the day, he was in a contest with Gohan, a person he had not seen before.

He looked at the song list, three songs, Iron Man - Black Sabbath, Only a Lad - Oingo Boingo, and the encore, 18 and Life - Skid Row.

The crowd cheered wildly as Gohan stepped onto the stage.

The lead singer introduced them, and he started to bring in the examples, when he pronounced his name, Izzy started to do a solo from Jukebox Hero - Foreigner. Gohan did a solo from Cherry Pie - Warrant.

"And now, I will start the song battle with, IRON MAN!"
The crowd went crazy.

We rocked on and on, not a single note missed. Then we hit Only a Lad, Gohan missed a note. Down to the Encore, Izzy decided if he should do a special move.

He Jumped into the air in the middle of the song.

Whats Going to happen?
13.title: Izzy Sparks And Gohan

131.content:
On his way down a flash of a camera from the crowd distracted him, causing a loss of balance.

He landed awkwardly on his left foot, and as he fell all he could think about was hitting the last notes.

Miraculously he managed to finish the song, all the while on the ground trying not to show that he was in too much pain.

Too the crowd it looked intentional and the wincing look on his face appeared to be him pouring his soul through his guitar.

He manged to get the crowd's side in that song but the encore was another story altogether.
131.title: Izzy Got Soul.

132.content: Izzy wins the battle. He can't believe that he beat Gohan. Now what's next. Will Izzy have to battle Goku(Gohan's father), Sora, or Axel Steel?
132.title: Izzy gains the crowd and lands it.

choices: sora wets his pants on stage
1322.content: sora decides to battle izzy but hes got stage fright and owes alot of pepople mony what should he do
1322.title: Sora

choices: izzy plays with ronnie james dio
13223.content: soras strings break and the whole show is ruined...bu izzy comes out weilding the gibson maruader and pedals set from hell and steals the show and either play with one legendary rock band
13223.title: soras strings break

132232.content: izzy is star struck and cant go and misses the chance of a life time hes in a coma and the only way to get up is to hold the marauder
132232.title: izzy plays with the who

choices: ignored the noise and continued to think about her music.
opened the door, punched the bellringer in the face, and went back to her couch.
14.content:
Judy Nails was sitting in her living room, thinking about what her next song would be. She never wrote lyrics (the singer did that), but Judy did always come up with a subject and tone, because it gave her a guideline to go by while she was actually playing guitar.

"Hmmmm.... Guy dumps girl, girl murders guy, girl makes it look like a suicide!" Judy grinned and started nodding her head to a potential beat of the song.

Suddenly, the doorbell rang. Judy...
14.title: Judy Nails

15.content: How about one of these heroes.
15.title: More Guitar Heroes

choices: Naruto Messes Up And Ruins The Whole Concert.
Naruto Hits Star Power And Wins It All.
Xavier Wins And Then Fights Naruto.
154.content:
It was the big day. Xavier Stone was playing at the Toxic tour. He got there and he kept asking around to see who he was going to go up against. Finally there was big commotion aroud the front gates to enter the concert. He ran up there and noticed that it was Naruto. He said "I can take this fruity kid!" Naruto got mad and he started doing weird things with his hands. "Let's start this kid."
Xavier was up first. He picked "Talk Dirty to Me" by Poison. He did not miss a single note. Nauto pick another song by Poison; "Nothin' But a Good Time."
154.title: Xavier Stone

choices: Okami Erases Naruto With His Magical Powers
Draws Naruto And Xavier As A Gay Couple
1541.content:
"Shadow-Clone Jutsu!" Naruto yelled. He then manipulated the concert, by cloning himself, and he was immediately disqualified. Okami was now in the lead, and the next opponent he had to face was Xavier Stone. He sat by the stage, using his Paintbrush Guitar to draw grafitti all over the wall.

Xavier Stone came over to observe his next opponent.

"Rahh Barr," said Okami, which meant YOU SUCK in doggy language.

Naruto walked in looking more cool than usual. "Good luck," he said, looking agitated. "May the best man, uuuuh dog, or whatever win." Xavier extended his hand for a handshake, and Naruto grabbed his hand firmly.

Then all of a sudden............
1541.title: Naruto Messes Up And Ruins The Whole Concert.

155.content: Here is the final batch of heroes. I hope you find who you're looking for.
155.title: Even More Guitar Heroes.

1551.content:
Lou was getting antzy he hadn't captured a soul in years. He didn't get why people would want to be "heroes," villans had much more fun and always had cooler weapons. "Well why sit down here and mope when I will find a few good battles on the Guitar Hero world?"
Lou looked into his crystal orb and found three prospective losers.
1551.title: Lou

15511.content:
Lou noticed the man named Goku, and he realized his name rhymed with Goku's, and he knew he had to do something about it, immediately. Lou channeled his energy in order to appear before Goku.

"Why must your name rhyme with that of mine?" Lou said. "I was here thousands of years before you, tormenting the minds of children who are probably 8000 years old by now."

"The reason my name rhymes with yours," Goku said, "Is because you're a big fat stinky face loser."

"AAAH, how dare you!!" Lou screamed, almost shedding a tear. "I guess I'm gonna have to show you who the LOSER is, young one."

They pulled out their weapons, Goku's DragonBall Guitar, and Lou's Undead Guitar. They then sprang towards one another, in an attempt to prove their valor.

what happened?
15511.title: Goku

15512.content:
Sora stepped off the gummi ship.
He asked Donald and Goofy, "Do you think that we will find Riku and the king here?"
"Well I dont know but it should be fun," said Goofy. The sky darkened and a crack appeared in the earth.
"Welcome foolish mortal to my stage!" said Lou with his possesed guitar in hand.
"Heartless?" yelled Donald.
"No, I just want to test my skills...and if you win I will give you this."
Lou held up a keyblade with a guitar pick on it.
"Your on!" said Sora, summoning the keyblade. But when it appeared it had strings on it.
"The weapon you have on other worlds is modified here. It turnes into a musical instument." Lou smiled "Now lets play!"
15512.title: Sora

155121.content:
"Choose your song," Lou said.
"How about Beast and the Harlot?" Sora responded.
"Very well." Lou starts strumming and the music flows through his guitar like water through a hole.
"Any time Sora," said Lou.
Sora jumps in around the lyrics of "This Shining City of Rome," and plays the way the music makes him feel remembering what got him started on this journey.
"The darkness," he wispered beneath his breath.
"Yes that is what I am," said Lou continuing to play.
"So then it's your fault!?" Sora pulled all the energy he could and attacked swinging the keyblade guitar at lou's head.
As Lou ducked he missed a note "$#%*!!"
"I win!" Sora said.
155121.title: Defeat Lou

1551211.content:
"Congrats even though I am evil I am honest. Here, you get a new keyblade...or keyguitar."
Sora caught the kaychain and looked at it. It was the nobody symbol.
"Who gave you this?" asked Sora
"Someone you know, his name was...
1551211.title: Lou Gives Sora The Keyblade

15512111.content:
Sora clipped on the keyguitar and the guitar flashed. The light died down revealing a Red V-Force guitar with silver spikes all over it.
"Nice huh?" said another voice .
"Axel?" said Sora, turning.
"You do have it memorized" said the red head.
"Well I'll be going now." said Lou, vanishing before another word was said.
15512111.title: axel"

155121112.content:
Lou teleported a random area. It seemed as if he were in some sort of fantasy world. He was in a vast plain, filled with a bunch of people riding yellow birds. Lou took a few steps back. But as he backed away in disbelief, he bumped into a tall man. He wore a red robe like attire, and carried a gigantic broadsword, which made him quite intimidating.

"This is my story," the man said, "and you're not part of it."

"And who might you be?" Lou said.

"Auron." Then all of a sudden, the man swung his big grey broadsword around, but as it neared Lou, it transformed into a Bushido Guitar. "What is this."

"I guess you didn't know, but in order to fight me, it can only be a guitar battle." Lou upchucked and endless belly laugh, as he called forth his possessed guitar. He then lifted his instrument, and played a expert line from the song "Through The Fire And The Flames."

Then.........
155121112.title: Auron

choices: The Devil Went Down To Georgia
1551211121.content:
"Is that the best you have?" Auron struck a chord and then went through the hardest part of Through Fire And The Flames.
"How did you get so good?" asked Lou.
"Well, I wander and in wandering I guess you pick up a few things."
"Do you know?"
1551211121.title: Auron Plays Right Back

15512111212.content:
"Actually..." Auron played and sang along with the song.
"Well I'll be dammed, a guardian sword fighter who can carry a note like a girl," said Lou laughing.
"If you dont shut up this note carrying girl' will snap off one of your horns and impale you with it," said Auron, putting the stoic guitar away.
"Hey Auron... that is your name right? Would you mind joining my band?"
Auron smiled and said.......
15512111212.title: The Devil Went Down To Georgia

15512112.content:
Sora clipped onto the keyguitar and the guitar flashed. The light died down revealing a blue electric guitar-shaped like the keychain
"Nice huh?" said another voice.
"Demyx?" said Sora, turning.
"This time they sent the right guy" said Demyx, preparing to fight.
"This could be interesting."
15512112.title: demyx"

info.brief_description: You get to decide the path of a true guitar hero.
info.description:
You have the opportunity to begin a chapter in an existing Guitar Hero legend's destiny. The fate of the guitar heroes lie in your hands. Choose Wisely.

You must choose the members of Guitar Hero listed in the multiple choice, and you cannot create your own Guitar Hero. You cannot kill off any of the heroes either.

I will allow any rock songs to be added to this story.

I suggest guitar battles to occur, against any other guitar heroes, and/or any other non-specific characters. You can also form alliances with any of the heroes or fanfiction characters of your choosing.

Here is a list of fanfiction characters I will allow my guitar heroes to encounter:

Goku- DragonBall Z character, weilds the DragonBall Guitar.

Gohan- Son of Goku, weilds the Kamehameha Guitar.

Sonic- Sonic The Hedgehog character, weilds the Ultra Guitar.

Okami- From the game Okami, weilds the Paintbrush Guitar.

Tidus- Final Fantasy character, weilds the Blitzball Guitar.

Yuna- Final Fantasy character, weilds the Pilgrimage Guitar.

Auron- Final Fantasy character, weilds the Stoic Guitar.

Sora- Kingdom Hearts character, weilds the Keyblade Guitar.

Kairi- Kingdom Hearts character, weilds the Starfruit Guitar.

Riku- Kingdom Hearts character, weilds the Dark Keyblade Guitar.

Mickey Mouse- Disney character, weilds the Steamboat Guitar.

Naruto- Naruto character, weilds the Shadow-Clone Guitar.

Scorpion- Mortal Kombat character, weilds the 187 Spear Guitar.

Dante- Devil May Cry character, weilds the Sparda Guitar.

You can choose any other fanfiction character you wish to encounter on your guitar heroic adventure. You can choose the name of your heroes or one of the characters you wish to encounter's guitar, even if you chose one of the previous characters to encounter.

You can make up a setting, or choose a fanfiction setting from one of your fictional characters.

I hope you give your Guitar Hero one heck of an adventure.
